abstract: Lions Gate Entertainment appealed directly to shareholders on Monday to thwart a hostile takeover attempt by the billionaire activist investor Carl C. Icahn that it calls ”inadequate, opportunistic and coercive.”
snippet: Lions Gate Entertainment appealed directly to shareholders on Monday to thwart a hostile takeover attempt by the billionaire activist investor Carl C. Icahn that it calls ”inadequate, opportunistic and coercive.”
lead_paragraph: Lions Gate Entertainment appealed directly to shareholders on Monday to thwart a hostile takeover attempt by the billionaire activist investor Carl C. Icahn that it calls ”inadequate, opportunistic and coercive,” The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Lions Gate Urges Shareholders to Reject Icahn’s Bid
